Articles.Author: Chris Moyse
Articles.Title: Sabrina’s Adeline Rudolph bags koveted Kitana role in Mortal Kombat 2
Articles.Description:
Kasting Kall
New Line continues to drip-feed kasting news for its upcoming movie sequel Mortal Kombat 2, announcing that British-Hong Kong actor Adeline Rudolph has bagged one of the film's most koveted roles, that of the Edenian princess, Kitana.
As noted in…

Articles.Author: Joey Paur
Articles.Title: Ben Affleck Reflects on His Time Playing Batman and Explains "There’s a Double-Edged Sword"
Articles.Description: Ben Affleck actually made a pretty badass Batman in the DCEU. I enjoyed him in the role, and you’ll get to see him in action as The Dark Knight one final time in DC’s The Flash movie. While we wait for that movie to be released, the actor recently talked abou…
